text: Juan Carlos Cárdenas (25 July 1945 – 30 March 2022) was an Argentine footballer and coach. He played for the Argentina national team from 1967 until 1976.rsssf Argentina international footballers He was known by the nickname "El Chango". ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:Argentine football managers
title: Juan Carlos Cárdenas
